page.title: 16Milk quotas
page.content: This is a subject on every farmers lips.In 1984 due to overproduction of milk farmers have been asked to cut their milk supplies. Prices have slumped and borrowings are under pressure from high interst rates. The decision was made by the EEC and it was thought a period of adjustment would be allowed but according to the farmer it seemed to have been implemented overnight. To overcome the difficulty farmers will be forced to either cut milk yields per cow or reduce herd numbers. A combination of both possibly.
